content.text: Match ends, Real Madrid 8, Almería 1.
Second Half ends, Real Madrid 8, Almería 1.
Attempt blocked. Sergio Ramos (Real Madrid) left footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Pepe.

Goal!  Real Madrid 8, Almería 1. Joselu (Real Madrid) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Cristiano Ronaldo with a cross.
Foul by Álvaro Arbeloa (Real Madrid).
Ortiz Bernal (Almería) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Substitution, Real Madrid. Joselu replaces Karim Benzema.
